name: ASST_SURG_SEC_ID
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The ASST_SURG_SEC_ID table holds secondary (legacy) identifiers for the assistant dental surgeon.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: ASST_SURG_SEC_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a qualifier describing additional IDs used to identify the assistant dental surgeon.

columns.name: ASST_SURG_SEC_ID
columns.description: This item holds additional IDs for the assistant dental surgeon.
